meanings.definition: A person who follows or upholds a particular belief or practice.
meanings.sent1: The adherers of the club's rules always arrive on time.
meanings.sent2: The adherers of the tradition wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent3: The adherers of the 'no dessert' rule were secretly eating cookies.
meanings.sent4: The adherers of the fitness regime were as dedicated as marathon runners.
meanings.sent5: The adherers of the diet plan inspired others with their commitment.

meanings.definition: Those who stick or cling to something.
meanings.sent1: The tiny adherers on the wall were geckos catching insects.
meanings.sent2: The adherers on the tree trunk were colorful leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The adherers on the sticky tape were tiny pieces of paper.
meanings.sent4: The adherers on the magnet were metal clips holding up notes.
meanings.sent5: The adherers on the window were raindrops creating patterns.
